title: Nightwatch Options Schema
description: Creates Nightwatchjs config, and add definition in the given or default project.

removeProtractor.description: When true, the protractor dependency and e2e directory will be removed from the project
removeProtractor.x-prompt: Would you like to remove Protractor from the project?

cucumberRunner.description: When true, cucumber test runner configuration will be added in nightwatch config
cucumberRunner.x-prompt: Would you like to use cucumber as a test runner? (default: false)

environment.description: The browser you want to run your e2e tests
environment.x-prompt: Which browser do you want to run the test on? (default: firefox)

noBuilder.description: When true, the angular.json file will not be modified to add Nightwatch commands, requiring the user to run Nightwatch from the command line independent of the Angular CLI
